data.text: @Y4C0P3 @Wyowanderer777 @tazcat2011 @jparcjr This is why we need universal background checks - to keep guns out of the hands of mentally ill

@Y4C0P3 @Wyowanderer777 @tazcat2011 @jparcjr The guy who shot and killed students and teachers at Virginia tech was mentally ill.
@Y4C0P3 @Wyowanderer777 @tazcat2011 @jparcjr The guy who shot and killed people at the Aurora movie theater was mentally ill.
@Y4C0P3 @Wyowanderer777 @tazcat2011 @jparcjr You don't give a mentally ill person a gun and then turn your back on him
@Y4C0P3 @Wyowanderer777 @tazcat2011 @jparcjr this guy was mentally ill and has a history of being treated for mental illness.
@ripgunsense @MomsDemand Apparently you don't find the large number of people killed with guns in the USA every year a matter of concern
@Y4C0P3 @Wyowanderer777 @tazcat2011 @jparcjr That is the whole point. Why turn your back on someone you know is mentally ill and given a gun
@ripgunsense @tazcat2011 @jparcjr @Wyowanderer777 @MomsDemand No try the CDC, FBI etc.
